trans-unit.source: Draws a border, background, or both around another element.
trans-unit.target: 다른 요소의 주위에 테두리, 배경 또는 둘 다를 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> can have only one child.
To display multiple child elements, you need to place an additional <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element within the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>.
trans-unit.target: 여러 자식 요소를 표시 하려면 추가 배치 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> 요소는 부모 내의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can then place child elements within that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: 내에 자식 요소를 둘 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to display a border around your content, you must place the elements within a parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> element.
trans-unit.target: 부모 내에서 요소를 배치 해야 콘텐츠 주위에 테두리를 표시 하려는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> and set properties in code and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> 코드에서 속성을 설정 하 고 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> this element uses to arrange its child element.
trans-unit.target: 이 요소에서 자식 요소를 정렬하는 데 사용할 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> element.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that represents the arranged size of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> element and its child element.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 요소 및 자식 요소의 정렬된 크기를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> can have only one child element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> 자식 요소가 하나만 있을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that fills the area between the bounds of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" />의 경계 간 영역을 채우는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that draws the background.
This property has no default value.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
The following example shows how to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background%2A> property by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code.
trans-unit.target: 값을 설정 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background%2A> 사용 하 여 속성 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 및 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that draws the outer border color.
trans-unit.target: 외부 테두리 색을 그리는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that draws the outer border color.
This property has no default value.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
The following example shows how to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderBrush%2A> property by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code.
trans-unit.target: 값을 설정 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderBrush%2A> 사용 하 여 속성 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 및 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderBrush" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the relative <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> that describes the width of the boundaries of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" />.
This property has no default value.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>
The following example shows how to set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는이 속성의 값을 설정 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which the corners of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> are rounded.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" />의 모퉁이가 둥근 정도를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.CornerRadius" /> that describes the degree to which corners are rounded.
This property has no default value.
Although the property name suggests that you can use only singular values, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.CornerRadius%2A> also supports non-uniform radii.
trans-unit.target: 단일 값만 사용할 수 있는 속성 이름을 제안 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.CornerRadius%2A> 도 균일 하지 않은 반지름을 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Radius values that are too large are scaled so that they blend smoothly from corner to corner.
trans-unit.target: 반지름 값이 너무 커서 원활 하 게 모퉁이가 혼합 크기가 조정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>
The following example shows how to set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는이 속성의 값을 설정 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Border.CornerRadius" /> dependency property.
An upper <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> limit that cannot be exceeded.

Measures the child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> before they are arranged during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Border.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> 실행 도중 자식 요소를 정렬하기 전에 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Border.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" />의 자식 요소를 측정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that represents the upper size limit of the element.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> element determines its upper <xref:System.Windows.Size> limit by analyzing the sizing properties, margin, and requested size of its child elements.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> 요소 상한을 결정 <xref:System.Windows.Size> 크기 조정 속성, 여백 및 요청 된 크기의 자식 요소를 분석 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> that defines the object to be drawn.
Draws the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> object during the render pass of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" />의 렌더링 처리 단계 동안 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> 개체의 콘텐츠를 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> value that describes the amount of space between a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> and its child element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" />와 자식 요소 사이의 간격을 설명하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" /> that describes the amount of space between a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> and its single child element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Thickness" />와 단일 자식 요소 사이의 간격을 설명하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>
The following example shows how to set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는이 속성의 값을 설정 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Padding" /> dependency property.
